tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Straightening Teeth (Invisalign) ,Invisalign Orthodontics,Orthodontic Treatment,Teeth Straightening,Composite Bondings,
review:
Invisalign is the perfect treatment option to fix orthodontic problems discreetly and with superior patient comfort.
The freedom to eat anything you like with little additional effort required to keep your teeth and aligners clean makes the process extremely convenient.

My Invisalign experience with Dr. Kothari was excellent. He created a treatment plan catering to my requirements and executed it with great attention to detail. His team enabled a smooth, effortless treatment with constant communication and a warm, helpful approach to any required assistance. The outcome of the treatment exceeded my expectations.

I recommend Dr. Jignesh Kothari for a flawless dental treatment experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Right from the time we first met Dr.Jignesh Kothari and until the day my daughter‚Äôs braces finally came off our interaction with him has been nothing but perfect! 

Everything about the clinic and the doctor are impressive. The way he carries himself, exuding an aura of calm professionalism, the way he puts you at complete ease, the staff is extremely cooperative and courteous, even the very melodious music playing in the clinic all adds to the amazing experience of a patient. Infact, we use to look forward to visiting the clinic every month because of all these positive factors! 

Thank you very much Dr.Kothari and his team! We are fortunate to have chosen you as our orthodontist!
